name: zync-os
description: A mock-up bootloader-only dummy operating system with a very basic shell.

scripts.build_bootloader: mkdir -p dist && nasm bootloader/bootloader.asm -f bin -o dist/bootloader.bin && cp dist/bootloader.bin dist/zync_os.img && truncate -s 1440k dist/zync_os.img

author: nthnn
